main event: A glass plate fell from the sky and landed at the residence of Mr. James Seabrook near Marysville, Ohio on August 23, 1959.
interesting points: The glass object had a smooth surface with four ground lines and appeared charred on the edges., It was identified as coming from a model balloon., Visual conditions were reported to be good at the time of the incident., The object was described as red tinted glass measuring 53 x 107 mm., A local newspaper published a picture of the glass object the day after it fell.
witness description: Mr. James Seabrook, who found the glass plate after it fell.
